import React from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; function Campaigns({ campdata }) { const history = useHistory(); return (

ONGOING CAMPAIGNS

{/* Active Slide */}

BE A PROUD DONOR

{/* Campaign Slides */} {campdata.map((info, index) => (

{info.title}

{info.content.slice(0, 150)}...

REQUIRED AMOUNT: Rs. {info.amount}
))}
{/* Carousel Controls */}
); } export default Campaigns;
